greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k), 0<=k<=n, read by rows given by [1,-1,0,0,0,0,0,...] DELTA [ -1,2,-1,0,0,0,0,0,0,...] where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938 .
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n = 0..50 of the triangle, flattened
formula: T(n, k) = (-1)^(k + floor(n/2)) * binomial(floor((n+1)/2), k - floor(n/2)). - _G. C. Greubel_, May 01 2021
program: (Magma) [(-1)^(k+Floor(n/2))*Binomial(Floor((n+1)/2), k-Floor(n/2)): k in [0..n], n in [0..12]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, May 01 2021
(Sage) flatten([[(-1)^(k+(n//2))*binomial(((n+1)//2), k-(n//2)) for k in (0..n)] for n in (0..12)]) # _G. C. Greubel_, May 01 2021
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Jun 13 2007, Aug 22 2007
